## â™¿ Accessibility Checklist
- [ ] **Semantic HTML**: Used appropriate elements (button, nav, main, etc.).
- [ ] **ARIA Labels**: Added `aria-label` to icon-only buttons or ambiguous elements.
- [ ] **Keyboard Navigation**: Verified the feature is usable via Tab and Enter keys.
- [ ] **Focus States**: Interactive elements have visible focus indicators.
- [ ] **Color Contrast**: Text and icons meet WCAG AA standards.
- [ ] **Alt Text**: Images have descriptive alt text (or `alt=""` if decorative).
